fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
3194: King will always spawn.
Factional chat
No factional kill
Each living player is a space. If and only if a non-investigative ability is used on a space a member occupies, that ability is used on that member.
If the space a member is occupying is lynched, that member must immediately move to another legal space.
If there is no King, but the King didn't die, the highest ranking piece (Queen > Rook > Bishop > Knight > Pawn) will become the King.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Protect the King from checkmate and deliver mate to the enemy.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Protect the King from checkmate and deliver mate to the enemy.
